name: Axion Data
tagline: Data Entry Projects and Internet Research
description:
At Axion, we specialize in data entry services. When your company hires Axion, we will develop a service plan for your specific data entry projects and forms processing requirements. Our approach to data entry and the technologies we employ enable us to deliver the highest levels of data quality, accuracy, and quick turnaround, but also address your need for document and data security and confidentiality.
Our extensive U.S. domestic work force is made up of experienced, professional data entry operators who have been with us for years. We also have a long-term, exclusive partnership with a firm in India for those data entry projects emphasizing cost-effectiveness and overnight turnaround. In either case, Axion’s centralized, tightly controlled computing environment ensures that all data and source documents remain secure.
There are many companies that can provide accurate data, quickly, and at a reasonable price. What distinguishes Axion is our responsiveness, flexibility, and ability to create a new process to solve a client’s problem. We work together with our client, as a team to develope innovative solutions, and to add value to their business.
